languages.text: Урон вычисляется по формуле: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}подавление отражения{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}) / 100)) В первую очередь производится расчет урона со всеми множителями. К показателю урона добавляются модификаторы (например, +2, −3, +4) — они указаны в описании оружия или выбранной {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}. Затем к ним добавляются процентные множители (+20%, +35%, −10%) — например, урон увеличивается на определенный процент в случае {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} или перегрева плазменного оружия. Также у некоторых противников есть собственные уникальные процентные {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к урону. Из полученной суммы сначала вычитается показатель отражения с учетом подавления отражения (значения выражаются в натуральных числах, например, 2, 4, 5), а затем — показатель брони с учетом пробития (выражается в процентах, например, 20%, 50%). Значение урона всегда округляется в меньшую сторону (вплоть до нуля).
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

traits.locale_text: Урон вычисляется по формуле: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − (отражение − подавление отражения)) × (1− ((броня − пробитие брони) / 100))) В первую очередь производится расчет урона со всеми множителями. К показателю урона добавляются простые множители (например, +2, −3, +4) — они указаны в описании оружия или выбранной способности. Затем к ним добавляются процентные множители (+20%, +35%, −10%) — например, урон увеличивается на определенный процент в случае {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} или перегрева плазменного оружия. Также у некоторых противников есть собственные уникальные процентные бонусы к урону. Из полученной суммы сначала вычитается показатель отражения с учетом подавления отражения (значения выражаются в простых числах, например, 2, 4, 5), а затем — показатель брони с учетом пробития (выражается в процентах, например, 20%, 50%). Значение урона всегда округляется в меньшую сторону (вплоть до нуля).

Урон вычисляется по формуле: Урон = ((расчет урона со всеми множителями − (отражение − подавление отражения)) × (1− ((броня − пробитие брони) / 100))) В первую очередь производится расчет урона со всеми множителями. К показателю урона добавляются простые множители (например, +2, −3, +4) — они указаны в описании оружия или выбранной способности. Затем к ним добавляются процентные множители (+20%, +35%, −10%) — например, урон увеличивается на определенный процент в случае {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического попадания{/g} или перегрева плазменного оружия. Также у некоторых противников есть собственные уникальные процентные бонусы к урону. Из полученной суммы сначала вычитается показатель отражения с учетом подавления отражения (значения выражаются в простых числах, например, 2, 4, 5), а затем — показатель брони с учетом пробития (выражается в процентах, например, 20%, 50%). Значение урона всегда округляется в меньшую сторону (вплоть до нуля).

languages.text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

К показателю урона добавляются модификаторы (например, +2, −3, +4) — они указаны в описании оружия или выбранной {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}. Затем к ним добавляются процентные множители (+20%, +35%, −10%) — например, урон увеличивается на определенный процент в случае {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} или перегрева плазменного оружия. Также у некоторых противников есть собственные уникальные процентные {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к урону. Из полученной суммы сначала вычитается показатель отражения с учетом подавления отражения (значения выражаются в натуральных числах, например, 2, 4, 5), а затем — показатель брони с учетом пробития (выражается в процентах, например, 20%, 50%). Значение урона всегда округляется в меньшую сторону (вплоть до нуля).

traits.locale_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = (damage calculation with all multipliers – (deflection − deflection negation)) × (1 − (armour − armour penetration/100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Simple multipliers (e.g. +2, -3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected ability. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, -10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage bonuses. From this resulting amount, to start, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

languages.text: Schaden wird anhand der folgenden Formel berechnet: Schaden = ((Schadensberechnung mit allen Multiplikatoren − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Ablenkungsnegierung{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}) / 100)). Zuerst wird die Schadensberechnung mit allen Multiplikatoren durchgeführt. Modifikatoren (wie +2, −3, +4) werden zum Schaden addiert – sie sind in der Beschreibung der Waffe oder der gewählten {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} angegeben. Dann werden prozentuale Multiplikatoren (+20 %, +35 %, −10 %) angewendet – zum Beispiel wird der Schaden um einen bestimmten Prozentsatz erhöht, wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g} oder eine Plasmawaffe überhitzt. Einige Feinde haben auch ihre eigenen prozentualen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Schadensboni{/g}. Von diesem resultierenden Betrag wird der Ablenkungswert abgezogen, wobei die Ablenkungsnegierung berücksichtigt wird (diese Werte werden als positive ganze Zahlen ausgedrückt wie 2, 4, 5). Danach wird die Schadensreduzierung durch die Rüstung abgezogen, wobei die Rüstungsdurchdringung berücksichtigt wird (ausgedrückt als Prozentsatz wie 20 %, 50 %). Der Schadenswert wird immer abgerundet (bis auf null).
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

traits.locale_text: „Schaden wird anhand der folgenden Formel berechnet: Schaden = ((Schadensberechnung mit allen Multiplikatoren − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Deflektionsnegierung{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}) / 100)). Zuerst wird die Schadensberechnung mit allen Multiplikatoren durchgeführt. Modifikatoren (wie +2, −3, +4) werden zum Schaden addiert − sie sind in der Beschreibung der Waffe oder der gewählten {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} angegeben. Dann werden prozentuale Multiplikatoren (+20%, +35%, -10%) angewendet − zum Beispiel wird der Schaden um einen bestimmten Prozentsatz erhöht, wenn ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischer Treffer{/g} oder eine Plasmawaffe überhitzt. Einige Gegner haben auch ihre eigenen prozentualen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Schadensboni{/g}. Von diesem resultierenden Betrag wird zunächst der Deflektionswert abgezogen, wobei die Deflektionsnegierung berücksichtigt wird (diese Werte werden als positive ganze Zahlen ausgedrückt wie 2, 4, 5). Danach wird die Schadensreduzierung durch die Rüstung abgezogen, wobei die Rüstungsdurchdringung berücksichtigt wird (ausgedrückt als Prozentsatz wie 20%, 50%). Der Schadenswert wird immer abgerundet (bis auf null).“

languages.text: La formule suivante est utilisée pour calculer les dégâts : dégâts = ((calcul des dégâts avec tous les multiplicateurs – ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}) / 100)). Dans un premier temps, le calcul des dégâts est effectué avec tous les multiplicateurs. Des modificateurs (par exemple +2, −3, +4) sont ajoutés aux dégâts. Ceux-ci sont indiqués dans la description de l'arme ou de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sélectionnée. Ensuite, les modificateurs en pourcentage (+20 %, +35 %, −10 %) sont appliqués. Par exemple, les dégâts augmentent d'un certain pourcentage en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} ou de surchauffe d'une arme à plasma. Certains ennemis disposent également de leurs propres {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts basés sur un pourcentage. La valeur de déflexion est ensuite soustraite du résultat, en prenant en considération la négation de déflexion (ces valeurs sont exprimées en nombres entiers positifs, par exemple 2, 4, 5). Puis, l'atténuation des dégâts conférée par l'armure est soustraite, en tenant compte de la pénétration d'armure (exprimée en pourcentage, par exemple 20 %, 50 %). La valeur de dégâts est toujours arrondie au nombre entier inférieur (jusqu'à zéro).
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

traits.locale_text: "Les dégâts sont calculés à l'aide de la formule suivante : dégâts = ((calcul des dégâts avec tous les multiplicateurs – ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}négation de déflexion{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}) / 100)). Dans un premier temps, le calcul des dégâts avec tous les multiplicateurs est effectué. Des multiplicateurs (par exemple +2, -3, +4) sont ajoutés aux dégâts. Ils sont indiqués dans la description de l'arme ou de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sélectionnée. Ensuite, des multiplicateurs de pourcentage (+20 %, +35 %, -10 %) sont appliqués. Par exemple, les dégâts augmentent d'un certain pourcentage en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g} ou de surchauffe d'une arme à plasma. Certains ennemis disposent également leurs propres {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts basés sur un pourcentage. À partir du résultat obtenu, la valeur de déflexion est soustraite, en prenant en compte la négation de déflexion (ces valeurs sont exprimées en nombres entiers positifs, par exemple 2, 4, 5). Puis, l'atténuation des dégâts d'armure est soustraite, en prenant en compte la pénétration d'armure (exprimée en pourcentage, par exemple 20 %, 50 %). La valeur des dégâts est toujours arrondie à l'unité inférieure (jusqu'à zéro)."

languages.text: 伤害的计算公式如下： 伤害=（（所有伤害因素造成的总伤害-（{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}））×（1-（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）/100）。 首先，所有伤害因素会以乘法进行计算。伤害的修正值（如+2、-3、+4）会在武器描述或选中的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}中显示出来。在这之后，使用百分比乘数（如+20%，+35%，-10%）对伤害进行计算。例如，攻击造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，或等离子武器过热的情况下，伤害会有不同程度的增减。部分敌人也同样拥有独特的百分比伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。 总伤害计算之后，会从这个值中减掉偏转值，偏转穿透也会在这个阶段中发挥作用。在这之后，计算护甲的百分比减伤效果，护甲穿透也会在这个阶段中发挥作用。 如果最终结果为小数，则会向下取整，最低造成0点伤害。
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

traits.locale_text: 伤害的计算公式如下： 伤害=（（所有伤害因素造成的总伤害-（{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}偏转穿透{/g}））×（1-（{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）/100）。 首先，所有伤害因素会以乘法进行计算。伤害的修正值（如+2、-3、+4）会在武器描述或选中的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}中显示出来。在这之后，使用百分比乘数（如+20%，+35%，-10%）对伤害进行计算。例如，攻击造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}，或等离子武器过热的情况下，伤害会有不同程度的增减。部分敌人也同样拥有独特的百分比伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。 总伤害计算之后，会从这个值中减掉偏转值，偏转穿透也会在这个阶段中发挥作用。在这之后，计算护甲的百分比减伤效果，护甲穿透也会在这个阶段中发挥作用。 如果最终结果为小数，则会向下取整，最低造成0点伤害。

languages.text: El daño se calcula con esta fórmula: daño = ((cálculo del daño con todos los multiplicadores – ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}) / 100)). Primero se realiza el cálculo del daño con todos los multiplicadores aplicables. Los modificadores (como +2, −3, +4) se añaden al daño, y vienen indicados en la descripción del arma o de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} seleccionada. Después se aplican los multiplicadores porcentuales (+20 %, +35 %, −10 %). Por ejemplo, el daño aumenta en cierto porcentaje si se produce un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} o se sobrecalienta un arma de plasma. Algunos enemigos también tienen sus propias {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} porcentuales al daño. De la cantidad resultante se resta el valor de desvío, teniendo en cuenta la negación de desvío (estos valores se expresan como números enteros: 2, 4, 5, etc.). Después, se resta la mitigación de daño de la armadura, teniendo en cuenta la penetración de armadura (expresada como un porcentaje: 20 %, 50 %, etc.). El valor del daño siempre se redondea hacia abajo (hasta cero).
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

traits.locale_text: «El daño se calcula con esta fórmula: daño = ((cálculo del daño con todos los multiplicadores – ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}negación de desvío{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}) / 100)). Primero se realiza el cálculo del daño con todos los multiplicadores aplicables. Los modificadores (como +2, −3, +4) se añaden al daño, y vienen indicados en la descripción del arma o de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} seleccionada. Después se aplican los multiplicadores porcentuales (+20 %, +35 %, −10 %). Por ejemplo, el daño aumenta en cierto porcentaje si se produce un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} o se sobrecalienta un arma de plasma. Algunos enemigos también tienen sus propias {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} porcentuales al daño. De la cantidad resultante se resta el valor de desvío, teniendo en cuenta la negación de desvío (estos valores se expresan como números enteros: 2, 4, 5, etc.). Después, se resta la mitigación de daño de la armadura, teniendo en cuenta la penetración de armadura (expresada como un porcentaje: 20 %, 50 %, etc.). El valor del daño siempre se redondea hacia abajo (hasta cero)».

languages.original_text: "Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers – (deflection − deflection negation)) × (1 − (armour − armour penetration) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected ability. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage bonuses. From this resulting amount, to start, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero)."

languages.text: ダメージは以下の式で算出する。 ダメージ＝（（全ての乗数でダメージ計算−（{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}ー{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}））×（1−（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}−{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}）／100））。 まず、全ての乗数でダメージを算出する。調整因子（+2、−3、+4など）をダメージに足す。これらは武器または選択中の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の説明に記載されている。そこでパーセンテージの乗数（+20％、+35％、−10％）を適用する。例えば、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}またはプラズマ兵器がオーバーヒートした場合にはダメージが特定のパーセンテージ分増加する。一部の敵には独自のパーセンテージで表すダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}がある。 この算出された値から、まずディフレクション無効化を考慮してディフレクションの値を差し引く（これらの値は2、4、5といった正の整数で表される）。次に、アーマー貫通を考慮し、アーマーによるダメージ軽減を差し引く（20％、50％のようにパーセンテージで表す）。 ダメージの値は必ず端数を切り捨てる（0まで）。
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).

traits.locale_text: 「ダメージは以下の式で算出する。 ダメージ＝（（全ての乗数でダメージ計算−（{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}ー{g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}ディフレクション無効化{/g}））×（1−（{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}−{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}）／100））。 まず、全ての乗数でダメージを算出する。調整因子（+2、−3、+4など）をダメージに足す。これらは武器または選択中の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の説明に記載されている。そこでパーセンテージの乗数（+20％、+35％、−10％）を適用する。例えば、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}またはプラズマ兵器がオーバーヒートした場合にはダメージが特定のパーセンテージ分増加する。一部の敵には独自のパーセンテージで表すダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}がある。 この算出された値から、まずディフレクション無効化を考慮してディフレクションの値を差し引く（これらの値は2、4、5といった正の整数で表される）。次に、アーマー貫通を考慮し、アーマーによるダメージ軽減を差し引く（20％、50％のようにパーセンテージで表す）。 ダメージの値は必ず端数を切り捨てる（0まで）。」

languages.text: Hasar şu formül ile hesaplanır: Hasar = ((Tüm çarpanlarla hasar hesaplaması − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Saptırma{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}Saptırma yadsıması{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Zırh{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Zırh delme{/g}) / 100)). İlk olarak, tüm çarpanlarla hasar hesaplaması yapılır. Değiştiriciler (örnek: +2, −3, +4) hasara eklenir. Bu değerler, silahın açıklamasında veya seçilen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyette{/g} belirtilir. Ardından yüzde çarpanları (+%20, +%35, −%10) uygulanır. Örneğin {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} veya plazma silahının aşırı ısınması durumunda hasar belirli bir yüzde oranında artar veya azalır. Ayrıca bazı düşmanların kendilerine özgü yüzde tabanlı hasar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusları{/g} bulunur. Çıkan bu sonuçtan, saptırma yadsıması dikkate alınarak saptırma değeri düşülür (bu değerler 2, 4, 5 gibi pozitif tam sayılarla ifade edilir). Sonra zırh değerinden, zırh delme hesaba katılarak hasar hafifletme çıkarılır (%20, %50 gibi yüzdelik değerlerle ifade edilir). Hasar değeri her zaman aşağı yuvarlanır (sıfıra kadar).
languages.original_text: Damage is calculated with the formula: damage = ((damage calculation with all multipliers − ({g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:DeflectionNegation}deflection negation{/g})) × (1 − ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} − {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) / 100)). Firstly, damage calculation with all multipliers is performed. Modifiers (e.g. +2, −3, +4) are added to the damage — they are indicated in the description of the weapon or the selected {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Then percentage multipliers (+20%, +35%, −10%) are applied — for example, damage is increased by a certain percentage in case of a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or a plasma weapon overheating. Some enemies also have their own unique percentage-based damage {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. From this resulting amount, the deflection value is subtracted, taking into account deflection negation (these values are expressed as positive integers, e.g. 2, 4, 5). Then the damage mitigation from armour is subtracted, taking into account armour penetration (expressed as a percentage, e.g. 20%, 50%). The damage value is always rounded down (down to zero).
